docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: About
docs.text:
Hi, I’m Brian Har.

I’m currently working as a Java Software Engineer, but my main focus is pivoting into:

  • Blockchain / Protocol Infrastructure
  • RPC / Node Operations
  • SRE / Reliability Engineering
  • L2 ecosystem (OP Stack style infra)

This site is my public learning log — where I document what I build, what breaks, and how I fix it.

docs.title: What I’m building in 2026
docs.text:
• Ethereum node + RPC infrastructure labs
  • Monitoring stack (Prometheus / Grafana)
  • Incident-style debugging + runbooks
  • Automation scripts to reduce manual ops work
  • Open-source contributions (node + infra tooling)

docs.title: Tech I’m focusing on
docs.text:
• Rust / Go
  • Linux systems & networking
  • AWS + Terraform
  • Docker / Kubernetes
  • Prometheus / Grafana
  • Ethereum execution/consensus clients
